column4: i am using kubuntu  Feisty Fawn 32bits, how can i change to the 64bits version? coz i am using a sempron 2.6 64bits processor and i wanted to see if i can get a better performance with the change of architeture
I don't think you'll get better performance, and some things won't be available (browser plugins), other stuffzz...maybe.
so who can i get a better performance on ubuntu? is there a how to?
